block.p: Marni Ruth Runyon and Russell Lee Kriegel were married last Monday by Rabbi Robert Scheinberg at the Forsgate Country Club in Monroe Township, N.J.

Mrs. Kriegel, 32, is an assistant research scientist in the child psychiatry department of the New York State Psychiatric Institute in Manhattan. She is a daughter of Carol and Stanley Runyon of East Brunswick, N.J.
Marni Ruth Runyon and Russell Lee Kriegel were married last Monday by Rabbi Robert Scheinberg at the Forsgate Country Club in Monroe Township, N.J.

Mrs. Kriegel, 32, is an assistant research scientist in the child psychiatry department of the New York State Psychiatric Institute in Manhattan. She is a daughter of Carol and Stanley Runyon of East Brunswick, N.J.
Mr. Kriegel, 34, is a senior architect for the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey, in Manhattan. He is the son of Lillian and Roland Kriegel of Bridgewater, N.J.

The couple, who graduated from Cornell University and later lived within two blocks of each other in Hoboken, N.J., did not meet until 1994, when both were invited to a going-away party in Manhattan for a co-worker of Ms. Runyon's. The two then shared a cab on the ride back to Hoboken.
